summary: THE FUEL SENDING UNIT  NEEDLE WILL JUMP FROM SIDE TO SIDE AND THE LIGHT WILL COME ON/OFF INTERMITTENTLY.  TS  THE CLOCKSPRING WAS INOPERATIVE, THE FUEL MODULE NEEDED TO BE REPAIRED, THE GAS TANK INDICATOR LIGHT BLINKED AND A TONE SOUNDED.  THE VEHICLE SEEMED FINE FOR A WHILE, BUT THE PROBLEM HAD COME BACK CONSTANTLY.  SCC
